name: This Could Be Us.
description:
This is a game from the perspective of myself.  My relationship with an ex girlfriend. It is a story about heartbreak, coming out, and loss. Press the different squares with your pointer (WESD keys). Each frame will be a slice of life of the story of my relationship and journey so far as a woman. Collect points by hitting the right frames in my story in sequence. Lose points when you make an error.

I hope you enjoy playing!
